meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>annoy</kanji> someone who's <kanji>busy</kanji> they're still going to be <vocabulary>busy</vocabulary>. You annoying them can't change them. Though now they're probably busy AND annoyed.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
